name: libsolv

about.description: libsolv, a free package dependency solver using a satisfiability algorithm.
about.summary: Library for solving packages and reading repositories

about.description: libsolv, a free package dependency solver using a satisfiability algorithm.
about.summary: Library for solving packages and reading repositories

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: "0.7.34"

recipe:
  name: libsolv-split
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/openSUSE/libsolv/archive/${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fd9c8a75d3ca09d9ff7b0d160902fac789b3ce6f9fb5b46a7647895f9d3eaf05
  patches:
    - if: win
      then: win_export_and_static_build.patch
    - conda_variant_priorization.patch
    - no_error_subdir_mismatch.patch

build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  - package:
      name: libsolv
    build:
      script: build_libsolv
    requirements:
      build:
        - ${{ compiler('c') }}
        - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ninja
        - cmake <4.0
      host:
        - zlib
      run_exports:
        - ${{ pin_subpackage('libsolv', upper_bound='x.x') }}
    tests:
      - package_contents:
          bin:
            - dumpsolv
          lib:
            - solv
            - solvext
            - if: linux
              then: libsolv.so.1
          include:
            - solv/repo.h
          files:
            not_exists:
              - if: unix
                then:
                  - lib/libsolv.a
                  - lib/libsolvext.a
                else:
                  - Library/lib/solv_static.lib
                  - Library/lib/solvext_static.lib
      - script:
          - if: unix
            then:
              - dumpsolv -h
              - cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build/ -D LIB_NAME="libsolv${SHLIB_EXT}" ${CMAKE_ARGS}
            else:
              - dumpsolv.exe -h
              - cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build/ -D LIB_NAME="solv" %CMAKE_ARGS%
          - cmake --build build/
          - cmake --build build --target test
        requirements:
          run:
            - ${{ compiler('c') }}
            - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
            - ninja
            - cmake <4.0
        files:
          recipe:
            - test/

  - package:
      name: libsolv-static
    build:
      script: build_libsolv
    requirements:
      build:
        - ${{ compiler('c') }}
        - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ninja
        - cmake <4.0
      host:
        - zlib
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("libsolv", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("libsolv", exact=True) }}
    tests:
      - package_contents:
          lib:
            - if: unix
              then:
                - libsolv.a
                - libsolvext.a
              else:
                - solv_static.lib
                - solvext_static.lib
          files:
            not_exists:
              - if: linux
                then:
                  - lib/libsolv.so
                  - lib/libsolvext.so
              - if: osx
                then:
                  - lib/libsolv.dylib
                  - lib/libsolvext.dylib
              - if: win
                then:
                  - Library/lib/solv.lib
                  - Library/lib/solvext.lib
      - script:
          - if: unix
            then: cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build/ -D LIB_NAME="libsolv.a" ${CMAKE_ARGS}
          - if: win
            then: cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build/ -D LIB_NAME="solv_static" %CMAKE_ARGS%
          - cmake --build build/
          - cmake --build build --target test
        files:
          recipe:
            - test/
        requirements:
          run:
            - ${{ compiler('c') }}
            - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
            - ninja
            - cmake <4.0

about:
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.BSD
  summary: Library for solving packages and reading repositories
  description: libsolv, a free package dependency solver using a satisfiability algorithm.
  homepage: https://github.com/openSUSE/libsolv
  repository: https://github.com/openSUSE/libsolv

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - AntoinePrv
    - pavelzw
    - SylvainCorlay
    - JohanMabille
    - wolfv
    - davidbrochart
    - adriendelsalle
